title: Disconnects but it isn't my internet
body:
I keep randomly disconnecting in game, but I'm on Skype and I am posting this right now.
I ran a speed test.. everything is fine better than ever even... But I keep DC'ing. 
Everyone stands in place.
I just lost plat 1 to this.. It's veerrryyy frustrating. 
Firewall is off, I don't have any Virus thing blocking anything... Whats going on? Thanks.

replies.body:
This is happening to me RIGHT NOW and I KNOW the tristana is gonna report me because they're freaking out everytime I log back in and attempt another reconnect. I obviously have internet but everything's acting like severe lag, except my ping's fine. Everything else is fine and it wasn't doing this yesterday.

edit:: trying to relog in, which I have to do like every minute and it kills me to do this to my team. But now it's stalled at 70% and just popped a network warning "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again." But my internet is fine. Clicked OK and game ended. Came to end of game chat (because naturally I'm not DC'd from the main client) and see the trist asking everyone to report me. Fabulous.

EXACTLY what happened to me. 
100% didn't miss a detail.
Did you ever find out how to fix?? Always happens to me
Did anyone find out the problem?
yep for me it isn't my wifi , i think my compu is infected

Lag or disconnections can be a little tricky to diagnose.  Since our game relies on a constant connection to the game servers, the impact of things like packet loss are usually felt far more in a game than in Skype or browsing the internets.

Can you go ahead and run through the steps in our [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)? This helps us rule out the common causes of what could be causing your problem. Let me know if this helps!
